name: SENRAN KAGURA SHINOVI VERSUS
description:
Simple installer
enables csmt with registry key
disables runtime
notes:
- Uses wine-staging 3.7 (prior 2.21; 3.0 - 3.5 had problems with sound or even starting)
- CSMT has to be enabled. If flickering occurs enable it under wine configuration -> wine-staging
- runtime is disabled because the game has some problems with resolution and some graphics like mouse pointer
- tested with Logitech F310 Gamepad. It was necessary to use the antimicro keymapper to let it properly work.
content:
game:
  appid: 411830
  args: -no-cef-sandbox
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix.
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: 'Wine Staging: Enabling CSMT'
    key: csmt
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: 1
steam:
  quit_steam_on_exit: true
system:
  disable_runtime: true
